Grapa

@author: Romain Carron Copyright (c) 2025, Empa, Laboratory for Thin Films and Photovoltaics, Romain Carron

Functions

grapa()

Start grapa GUI

Modules

GUI

Graphical user interface GUI of grapa

colorscale

Classes and functions to deal with colors and colorscales.

constants

Module storing the values of physical constants, expressed in SI units.

curve

Defines Curves, a fondamental object to grapa.

curve_image

A subclass of Curve to deal with images, contour and contourf

curve_inset

A subclass of Curve to deal with plot insert

curve_subplot

A subclass of Curve to deal with subplots

database

Database os not quite a Graph.

datatypes

graph

Graph class, most important in grapa together with Curve.

mathModule

Functions dealing with math
